vlanNetwork.heroSubtitle: Private and secure VLAN networks to protect your data and isolate your networks. Advanced solutions for network segmentation with high security and excellent performance.
vlanNetwork.setupSubtitle: Simple and easy setup for your VLAN network in just 3 steps
vlanNetwork.step1Description: Purchase a dedicated server from our range of high-performance options
vlanNetwork.step2Description: Reach out to our billing team to request VLAN network setup
vlanNetwork.step3Title: VLAN network is up and ready for use
vlanNetwork.step3Description: Your private VLAN network will be configured and ready for immediate use
vlanNetwork.secureNetworkingSubtitle: HostSailor has been in the web hosting game for years… offering private VLAN (PVLAN) services—designed with security and flexibility in mind.
vlanNetwork.howPvlanWorksDescription: A PVLAN divides a single broadcast domain into smaller, secure sub‑domains. Each server connects through a switch, with restricted ports that only talk to specific uplinks. These restricted ports—known as private ports—keep your network traffic neat, secure, and isolated.
vlanNetwork.perfectUseCaseDescription: PVLANs are perfect for anyone who values a high‑security setup. For example, block public access to your critical database servers while allowing only your front‑end web servers to communicate with them.
vlanNetwork.readyToStartSubtitle: Create an account and contact our support team by opening a ticket. We're here to help!
vlanNetwork.cryptoPaymentsSubtitle: Our VLAN Network now supports payments via Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies. Skip traditional payment methods and enjoy advantages of fast, anonymous, and tax‑free transactions. Choose a plan, pay effortlessly from anywhere, and get started instantly.
vlanNetwork.faqsSubtitle: Answers to frequently asked questions about VLAN Network services
vlanNetwork.faq1Question: How can I get my own private VLAN working?
vlanNetwork.faq1Answer: You can purchase a server from us and request the private VLAN. You will have to get a second NIC to connect to the VLAN.
vlanNetwork.faq2Question: Will this incur any additional charges?
vlanNetwork.faq2Answer: The only additional charge is for adding a second NIC.
vlanNetwork.faq3Question: Can I get a private VLAN without having a server at HostSailor?
vlanNetwork.faq3Answer: No, you need to have a dedicated server from HostSailor to get your VLAN.
vlanNetwork.faq4Question: If I have a /24 purchased from a different company, is it possible to use it for enabling the private VLAN?
vlanNetwork.faq5Question: Is it possible to use the private VLAN on the VPS platform?
vlanNetwork.faq5Answer: No, we are providing it with dedicated servers only.
vlanNetwork.faq6Question: What is the ETA for the setup?
vlanNetwork.faq6Answer: Once the IP range and server is ready, the setup will normally take a day.
vlanNetwork.faq7Question: In which locations is this service offered?
vlanNetwork.faq7Answer: We provide private VLAN in all 3 locations we serve.
vlanNetwork.ctaTitle: Ready to start your VLAN Network journey?
vlanNetwork.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of customers who trust us to manage their private networks. Get specialized technical support and customized solutions for your needs.

storageKVMVPS.heroTitle: Storage-Optimized KVM VPS — Powered by RAID10 Stability & Redundancy
storageKVMVPS.heroSubtitle: Designed with enterprise-grade RAID10 storage for high performance and reliability, this VPS tier is ideal for disk-heavy applications. Perfect if you need reliable storage rather than NVMe speed.

plans.title: Storage VPS Plans & Pricing
plans.subtitle: Choose from our range of storage-optimized KVM VPS plans with RAID10 reliability and enterprise-grade features

storageKVMVPS.note: Note: These tiers suit users focusing on stable storage over throughput-intensive environments. Unlike NVMe-based VPS, backups are not automatically included for Storage VPS tiers.

benefits.title: What Sets Storage KVM VPS Apart
benefits.subtitle: Everything you need for storage-optimized virtual private servers with maximum reliability

raid10Architecture.title: RAID10 Storage Architecture
raid10Architecture.description: Offers strong redundancy and consistent performance, balancing safety and affordability.

trueKVMVirtualization.title: True KVM Virtualization
trueKVMVirtualization.description: Each VPS runs its own kernel and reserved RAM, ensuring isolation from neighboring nodes.

multipleOSSupport.title: Multiple OS Support
multipleOSSupport.description: Install Linux, Windows, BSD, Solaris, or custom ISOs with full flexibility.

highUpgradeFlexibility.title: High Upgrade Flexibility
highUpgradeFlexibility.description: Scalable resource options as your requirements grow with easy upgrades.

instantAvailability.title: Instant Availability
instantAvailability.description: Your server goes live immediately after payment confirmation with zero delays.

enterpriseReliability.title: Enterprise Reliability
enterpriseReliability.description: Designed for stable long-term hosting with enterprise-grade infrastructure.

useCases.title: Ideal Use Cases
useCases.subtitle: Perfect for storage-heavy applications and long-term hosting solutions

dataIntensive.title: Data-Intensive Applications
dataIntensive.description: Perfect for hosting backups, media, or storage-backed services.

virtualization.title: Virtualization & Low-cost Nodes
virtualization.description: Great for setting up multiple lightweight virtual machines.

stableHosting.title: Stable Long-term Hosting
stableHosting.description: For customers prioritizing reliability over raw speed.

storageHeavy.title: Storage-Heavy Workloads
storageHeavy.description: Ideal for applications requiring large storage capacity.

comparison.title: Storage VPS vs NVMe VPS
comparison.subtitle: Choose the right VPS type for your specific needs

storageType.description: Storage VPS uses HDD with RAID10 for reliability, while NVMe VPS uses high-speed SSDs

performance.description: Storage VPS offers consistent performance, NVMe VPS provides maximum speed

cost.description: Storage VPS is more cost-effective for large storage needs

useCase.description: Storage VPS for data-heavy apps, NVMe VPS for speed-critical applications

addons.title: Add-Ons & Licenses
addons.subtitle: Enhance your Storage VPS with additional services and control panels

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Common questions about Storage KVM VPS hosting

backupsIncluded.question: Are backups included with Storage VPS?
backupsIncluded.answer: Unlike NVMe-based VPS, backups are not automatically included for Storage VPS tiers. We offer manual backup options and automated backup solutions as add-ons.

operatingSystems.question: What operating systems are supported?
operatingSystems.description: Storage VPS supports Linux, Windows, BSD, Solaris, and custom ISO installs. You have full flexibility to choose your preferred operating system.

upgradeResources.question: Can I upgrade my Storage VPS resources?
upgradeResources.description: Yes, Storage VPS offers high upgrade flexibility. You can easily scale your resources as your requirements grow with our upgrade options.

raid10Storage.question: How does RAID10 storage work?
raid10Storage.description: RAID10 combines mirroring and striping to provide both redundancy and performance. Your data is mirrored across multiple drives for safety while maintaining good read/write speeds.

contact.title: Need Help Choosing?
contact.subtitle: Contact our sales team for custom configurations or technical support

cta.title: Ready to Deploy Your Storage VPS?
cta.subtitle: Get instant deployment upon payment confirmation. Choose your plan and start building your storage infrastructure with enterprise-grade RAID10 reliability and 24/7 support.
